titleStmt.title: A proclamation for apprehending several traitors and fugitives
Proclamations. 1685-06-24
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet, at Edingburgh, the twenty fourth day of June, 1685. And of our reign the first year.
Arms 237; Steele notation: Arms, tor manner.
DFo copy, reel 2370, cropped with loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
